string.name: name
string.value: A New Skill for Dawn Warriors
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101003##k...

#p1101003# told me there is indeed a new skill, but it's dangerous for me to learn the skill right now based on my level. He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #b#t4032121##k... \n\n#i4032120# #t4032120# #b#c4032120# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032120#. #p1101003# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called Brandish.

...What is it? A new skill? ...#p1101002# must have mentioned something totally unnecessary. Yes, there is a new skill available, but you are not qualified to get one, with the level you are currently in. It's too dangerous for you to use it.
#b#L0#I still want the skill.#l
#L1#Since it's considered dangerous, then I have no choice but to...#l
#k

...If you really want the skill, then there is a way. You'll have to prove it to me that you are worthy of learning the new skill. Of course, it's not going to be easy. You may even have to risk your life to do so. Do you still want to do it?
Are you backing out because it's considered dangerous? That's not the way the Knights operate.
At the very end of Training Forest is the Training Hall. The test will take place at #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, so I want you to go in there, take your best shot, and bring back #b#t4032120##k.
...I did warn you of the danger, but for you to actually back out...
You managed to bring #t4032120#. That's good. I see that you are qualified enough to learn a new skill. I will teach you a new skill now. Get ready.
I have just taught you a new skill for the Dawn Warrior, #bBrandish#k. Use this skill for the good of the Empress.
Were you not able to find #b#t4032120##k yet? #t4032120# can only be found at #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#.
